entry.title: Fizarolli Favourites
entry.summary:
Author: FizarolliSparks248

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,426Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 8

Summary: If you haven‚Äôt already please check out my previous works or you might be confused. So I often write my fics out of order, that obviously makes some of my favourite parts take a while to publish so this is a selection of some of my favourite chapters that I have written. HUGE SPOILERS AHEAD FOR SOME OF MY FICS but to make it more interesting I will not specific which one's they are from if they haven't already been published yet. entry.title: Here‚Äôs to the Fools Who Dream.
entry.summary:
Author: fzanchikk

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,414Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 14

Summary: The door closes behind them with a soft click. In the darkness, he can barely make out Bruce's outline by the bed‚Äîcan just see how he sits down, then pats the bed right next to him. A silent command. Come here. Clark hovers up to him‚Äîmaking himself comfortable, standing in between the other's legs. He looks down to the man as his hand cradles his jaw. The room is cast in inky shadows, save for the faint hint of moonlight through the open window and the glow of the city below. In the darkness, he can barely make out the sharp planes of Bruce's face. But he doesn't need to see him to feel him. He looks otherworldly like this. Beautiful.

entry.title: When I Am Young and Beautiful
entry.summary:
Author: wordswillwrite

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,750Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 28

Summary: ‚ÄúI can't be both your protector and your executioner.‚Äù Clara couldn't speak. The tears spilled over, hot and bitter. Bruce reached out, his gloved hand wiping them away with a gentleness that felt like a knife. He had spent years planning how to stop her, building lead-lined vaults she couldn't see, hiding caches of Kryptonite across the globe‚Äîall while she had spent her life trying to love the man behind the cowl. Or) Bruce Wayne, the most dramatic man she knows, dies quietly one afternoon in his Manor. Clara is left to pick up the pieces. To the world, she is Superwoman, an ageless symbol of hope. To Metropolis, she is Clara Kent, an editor hiding behind layers of synth-skin makeup to show the age she will never experience. But at Bruce Wayne‚Äôs funeral, the mask is slipping. Left behind in the wake of his ten-year silence is a grieving family, a dying Lex Luthor with a devastating secret, and one final parting gift from a man who was both loving and ruthless.

entry.title: Sun Starved
entry.summary:
Author: Fish_stik

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,874Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 70

Summary: Bruce had just been patrolling one night. That's all. Nothing world-ending (not that Alfred knew about his nightly ventures‚Äîwhich itself might be Bruce-ending), and yet here he was. Dragged to some backwater summer camp for "half-bloods" by a young woman after helping her fight off some weird meta thug, where everyone took Ancient Greek myths far too seriously. Don't get him wrong, he loved those stories; he basically grew up on them, but there was no way that this was all real. ¬† Like, come on... A half-horse activities director? Magical strawberry fields? It was all too much, and that was coming from the guy from a city overrun with metas and who lived right next door to the place with an alien as its hero. Though Bruce didn't know or even trust the guy (?), Superman made far more sense than these demigods.¬†¬†Bruce fights a minotaur with Diana and gets dragged to Camp Half-Blood, where he then finds out he‚Äôs a demigod, makes a very attractive friend, and finds out the sun has been stolen. What a killer summer‚Ä¶

entry.title: Syzygy
entry.summary:
Author: SirCable

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,573Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Clark and Bruce are like day and night. One can't exist without the other. When Playboy, Bruce Wayne takes a liking to a clumsy, Clark Kent, it can't possibly go wrong. After all they are just friends, except Clark can't get Bruce out of his head. The two begin to worry about how this blooming relationship will affect their daily lives. Not to mention, their alter egos work together every night since news about illegal gun smuggling broke out. Will their day relationship compromise the integrity of their night one?

entry.summary:
Author: DaniDany

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,687Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: The Jedi Council began to experience visions through the Force. A presence capable of destroying both the Light and the Dark. It did not seek balance‚Äîonly obedience. In the most ancient texts, its name was unmistakable: Darkseid. Faced with this threat, the Jedi scattered across the galaxy in search of answers. Kal-El, a Jedi Knight and member of the Council, was sent to the Outer Rim. Along with the mission, he received one additional order: to train Kon, a boy whose past remains a mystery to all. Hunted by bounty hunters, and bound together by a destiny neither of them wanted, master and apprentice eventually ally themselves with a Mandalorian family‚Äîwarriors without the Force, yet possessing a will strong enough to defy it.
